text: KSYB (1300 AM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Shreveport, Louisiana. The station is owned by Amistad Communications, Inc., and airs a gospel music format. The station was assigned the call sign KFLO by the Federal Communications Commission on August 26, 1974. The station changed its call sign to KSYB on July 27, 2002. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for KSYB * FCC History Card for KSYB * Category:Radio stations in Louisiana Category:Radio stations established in 1976 Category:1976 establishments in Louisiana Category:Gospel radio stations in the United States Category:Caddo Parish, Louisiana Category:Christian radio stations in Louisiana
title: KSYB
